name: Overlord - Fantasy PVP Battle Royale
description:
Overlord - Fantasy PVP Battle Royale is a real-time battle online game. Allow 10 players in the battle, with many modes and awesome features, Overlord is the best real-time PVP game experience on mobile!

Players can craft unlimited equipment with different styles. You can customize your character's appearance as you want, and many more features are waiting for you to explore.

AVAILABLE ON MOBILE:

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nexgames.overlord

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528638606
